name: Here Comes That Frog
description:
Here Comes That Frog is about Pebble, a clueless frog who just started his strawberry delivery job. But Pebble doesn't know anything about helmets, and he got into a lot of trouble. Discover more about Pebble's wholesome story by collecting all the comic pieces! 

The game is a student project to advocate for AIP Foundation's aim to raise awareness about helmet quality. Here Comes That Frog tries to spark interest and conversations about helmet quality through an entertaining and interactive gameplay experience.

What we've got over here?  

🐸 The game is available in English and Vietnamese
🐸 5 maps with Vietnamese neo-nostalgia aesthetics 
🐸 5 comic chapters reward for each map! 
🐸 Explore the characters and Pebble's story by collecting comics! 
🐸 Cute helmets, cool fox, wholesome contents, come play! 
🐸 Available for AndroidCreator credits

Creator Credits

🍓 Director: Thế Kì Lân
🍓 Programmers: Lan Thảo, Tiên Nguyễn
🍓 Illustrators: Kyou Nguyễn, Thế Kì Lân
🍓 Designers: Quang Nguyễn, Thế Kì Lân
🍓 Sound: mintypoo, Nguyễn Anh Kiệt, Nicolas Martigne, TreasureSounds
🍓 Typeface: Marcelo Magalhães

Have a nice day!
